content.title: We've almost hit 20% of our goal in just 48 hours!
content.creator:
Oscar Garcia
March 9, 2025
content.content:
Dear ECHOBLAST Backers and viewers,
We are absolutely thrilled to share that, within the first 48 hours of our Kickstarter launch, we are very close to reaching 20% of our funding goal! This incredible momentum wouldn't be possible without each and every one of you who believes in bringing back the nostalgic sounds of the '90s with a modern twist.
What's Next?
As we continue this journey, we're excited to unveil the first of our stretch goals, that will enhance your ECHOBLAST experience:
At 50% Funding: Unlock a special edition sound pack, featuring iconic effects from the '90s era.
Spread the Word

Your support has been instrumental in our progress (pun intended). To keep the momentum going, we encourage you to share our campaign with friends, family, and fellow vintage and sound enthusiasts. Together, we can make ECHOBLAST a reality for everyone who cherishes vintage memorabilia and small gadgets.
Join the Conversation
We'd love to hear your thoughts and suggestions! Feel free to drop us a message or comment on our Kickstarter page. Your feedback is invaluable in shaping the future of ECHOBLAST.
Once again, thank you for your incredible support. Let's keep the energy high and continue this exciting journey together!
Have a blast!
The ECHOBLAST Team.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/echoblast/echoblast-reviving-the-90s-sound-effects-keychains

https://www.instagram.com/echoblast_official/

comments.text: Hey Mitchell. Yes! That is the old 90s version. What we have here is the renewed 2.0 version of that one. In this one, you will have rechargeable battery via USB, so the 2 day lasting button batteries wont be a problem anymore. Also, you will be able to customize your sounds via the USB port. Best, O.
